name: Unstable Mines
description:
The game is quite simple, you are a robot tasked with clearing blocks using mines that you create every x seconds. The mines are stagnant initially but as soon as something collides with them they get triggered and a count down starts. When the count down reaches 0 they explode and damage everything around them.

You can also find different types of mines hiding in the yellow blocks.

I have only used the default graphics you get with Unity (Square, Circle, Hexagon), used photoshop for the banner and icon.

I generated the music with Store and fine-tuned it with Adobe Audition.

For SFX, i have used some base sounds from my previous games and "remade" them using Adobe Audition to match this game.

Let me know what you think and be honest :)
